meanings.definition: To dry (something) quickly and roughly using a towel or other material.
meanings.sent1: After swimming, she quickly roughdried her hair with a towel.
meanings.sent2: I always roughdry my clothes when I'm in a hurry.
meanings.sent3: The puppy decided to help by roughdrying the dishes with its tail.
meanings.sent4: His laughter roughdried the tears on her cheeks.
meanings.sent5: The storm's wind roughdried the laundry on the line in minutes.

meanings.definition: The act of drying something quickly and roughly using a towel or other material.
meanings.sent1: His roughdrying of the dishes left them still wet.
meanings.sent2: I prefer air-drying over roughdrying my clothes.
meanings.sent3: The cat's attempt at roughdrying the spilled milk was quite a sight.
meanings.sent4: The roughdrying of the paint caused it to crack and peel.
meanings.sent5: The roughdrying of the clay sculpture gave it a unique texture.
